column5: Ive never heard of these brand of outboards but searching on ebay i see quite a few of them for and they are traditionally cheaper than name brand outboards like honda or yamaha.  i posted the question about the kicker motor, looking for a 4-6 hp kicker, should i consider these when buying?  any opinions?
Is there a local dealer? Can you get warrantee service?
My 2003 mercury 20hp tiller short shaft is a Tohatzu. They make most 2 stroke under 30 hp on the market . http://www.onlineoutboards.com/m_help.html#p_2
